thread.title: Breaking News: Asante Kotoko win appeal case against Hearts of Oak, to have docked points restored
thread.title_full: Breaking News: Asante Kotoko win appeal case against Hearts of Oak, to have docked points restored

title: Breaking News: Asante Kotoko win appeal case against Hearts of Oak, to have docked points restored
text:
Sports News | 20 October 2015 18:10 CET Breaking News: Asante Kotoko win appeal case against Hearts of Oak, to have docked points restored - www.ghanasoccernet.com Obed Owusu is the player considered to be unqualified to play against Hearts of Oak 
Asante Kotoko have been successful with their appeal against the Disciplinary Committee’s decision to dock them points for allegedly using an unqualified player and will consequently have all their docked points – some of which was given to rivals Hearts of Oak – restored, GHANAsoccernet.com is reliably informed. 
More to follow….
